data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yamane, S., Bui, T. V., Eguchi, K. (2008): Opamyrma hungvuong, a new genus and species of ant related to Apomyrma (Hymenoptera: Formicidae: Amblyoponinae). Zootaxa 1767: 55-63, URL: http://atbi.biosci.ohio-state.edu/HymOnline/reference-full.html?id=21682|1 occurrence
